purpose: To create an incentive mechanism for fostering internet-scale conversational intelligence
principle: Combines blockchain technology with conversational AI to create a scalable incentive system
reusability: Modular architecture allows integration with various conversational AI systems and blockchain platforms
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited real-world testing; scalability and security aspects need further evaluation
name: apex
